author: phas0ruk
content: Would it be possible to request funding if we stated on our application that we were not applying for it ?

author: joshd4078
content: We are sending out acceptance/rejection letters by the end of the week. So you will have an answer regarding acceptance very soon. If you were not accepted, there will be some guidance around how to participate without being "officially" accepted.

author: erayack
content: Thank you so much Josh for your quick response. I saw the results announced in one of the developer discord groups.

author: joshd4078
content: If we request a follow-up meeting with you, you can amend your request for funding at that time.
